title: BrowserDisplayStatistics

metadata.description: Learn about BrowserDisplayStatistics with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
'
statistics may not be relevant to
your
web site. Different sites 
attract different audiences. Some web sites attract developers 
using professional hardware, while other sites attract hobbyists using older  computers.
Anyway, data collected from ' log-files over many years clearly shows the long term trends.

Color Depth Statistics
Newer computers use 24 or 32 bits display hardware, and are able to display 16,777,216 different colors.
Older computers use 16 bits display hardware, which gives a maximum of 65,536 different colors.
Very old computers use 8 bits color hardware, which gives a maximum of 256 colors.
Learn more about color display

summary: This tutorial covers BrowserDisplayStatistics concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use BrowserDisplayStatistics effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of BrowserDisplayStatistics and how to apply it in your projects.
